Description: Adventist Health System/West, dba Adventist Health, and its affiliated hospital White Memorial Medical Center agreed to pay the United States and the state of California $14.1 million to settle claims that they violated the False Claims Act. The settlement resolved allegations that Adventist Health improperly compensated physicians who referred patients to the White Memorial facility by transferring assets, including medical and non-medical supplies and inventory, at less than fair market value.

Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
